text: Ivan Girev (born 29 June 2000) is a Russian swimmer. He currently represents Energy Standard in the International Swimming League. He participated at the 2019 World Aquatics Championships, winning a medal.4 × 200 metre freestyle relay results ==References== Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Russian male swimmers Category:Russian male freestyle swimmers Category:World Aquatics Championships medalists in swimming
title: Ivan Girev
